Bellra:
Hello, my name is Bellra. I help heroes access instance zones. I can help you get to Tauti, Frintezza, Octavis and Antharas. Instance zone counter is reset at 6:30 a.m. every Saturday. Keep that in mind.
- Standard difficulty: Lv. 107, 21+ characters in the command channel
- High difficulty: Lv. 112, 21+ characters in the command channel
